DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test how well lanthanum carbonate reduces the pre-dialysis level of serum phosphorus in subjects undergoing dialysis due to end stage renal disease and to determine the patient and physician's satisfaction.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Fosrenol in Treating Elevated Serum Phosphate Levels in Adults With End Stage Renal Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients with ESRD who currently require treatment for hyperphosphatemia Female patient who is pregnant or lactating Patient has used any investigational product within 30 days of screening
